snippet: Scientists have detected evidence of unreported prescription drug side effects before they were found by the Food and Drug Administration’s warning system.
abstract: Scientists at Microsoft, Stanford and Columbia University, using data drawn from queries entered into Google, Microsoft and Yahoo search engines, have for first time detected evidence of unreported prescription drug side effects before they were found by the Food and Drug Administration’s warning system; study is reported in Journal of the American Medical Informatics Association.
lead_paragraph: Scientists have detected evidence of unreported prescription drug side effects before they were found by the Food and Drug Administration’s warning system.

headline.main: Unreported Side Effects of Drugs Are Found Using Internet Search Data, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Unreported Side Effects of Drugs Are Found Using Internet Search Data, Study Finds
